h1_title: How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items
h2_title: Claiming Deluxe Edition Items in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Firstly, it should be noted that if you purchased the Standard Edition of Black Myth: Wukong, you can upgrade to the Deluxe Edition**at any time and still receive the items**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Claim_Deluxe_Edition_Items.md', within the main section titled 'How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items', specifically from the subsection 'Claiming Deluxe Edition Items in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
Firstly, it should be noted that if you purchased the Standard Edition of Black Myth: Wukong, you can upgrade to the Deluxe Edition**at any time and still receive the items**.
